actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 302 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the redemption of corporate stock held by an estate or trust.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to limit the application of the attribution of ownership rules to a trust or estate which terminates its interest in a corporation through a stock redemption, for purposes of treating the proceeds from the stock redemption as capital gain.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 302 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 with respect to the redemption of corporate stock held by an estate or trust.
